entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is imposing harsh punishments on Harry.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A potions master at Hogwarts who is known for being strict and intimidating.

relationships.description: Harry was detained by Umbridge, indicating that she had authority over him in this situation.
Harry is likely to be in detention with Snape if he doesn't complete his homework, indicating a potential future interaction between the two.
